title: Delta is the 'most serious' COVID-19 variant, scientists say. How will it affect the US?
content:
1. Delta is the 'most serious' COVID-19 variant, scientists say. How will it affect the US?  USA TODAY
  2. Cases of a dangerous Covid-19 variant are 'rapidly increasing' in US, expert says  CNN
  3. COVID-19: PM, 'UK's not met 4 tests required for June 21 freedom day' amid spread of Delta variant  The Sun
  4. Kansas doctors, public health officials concerned about 'Delta Variant' spread  KWCH
  5. CDC now calls coronavirus Delta variant a 'variant of concern'  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 最も深刻なCOVID-19の亜種であると科学者が発表。米国への影響は？
